p: Two sets of TPPs, one for human and one for veterinary vaccines, were provided by WHO for public comment. Both the human and veterinary TPPs have many features in common, and both contain rigid requirements to protect against genomic reassortment of LAVs with wild-type RVF virus (RVFV). We believe the draft TPPs place undue constraints on development and regulatory approval of LAVs and need to be revised to provide a more balanced assessment of the benefit:risk equation.
